description:
DiGiTALZONE  P R E S E N T S          
     

PAYDAY.2.v.1.24.1.Incl.All.DLC.Online.Ready-DiGiTALZONE 
        PROTECTiON ................: Steam                   
                 SiZE ......................: 8.66 GB                     
                    TYPE ......................: Full Game                                    
                                                                               
                                                                               
    
  GAME iNFO    
                                                          
   GENERAL                                                              
                                                                                                                               
    Title: PAYDAY 2                                                          
    Genre: Action, RPG                                                       
    Developer: OVERKILL                                                      
    Publisher: 505 Games                                                     
    Release Date: Aug 2013                                                   
    Languages: English*,German,French,Italian,Spanish,Dutch,Russian                  
    *languages with full audio support                                       
                                                                             
                                                    
   MODES                                                               
                                                                                                                            
    Single-player                                                            
    Co-op                                                                    
                                                                             
                                                     
   ABOUT                                                                
                                                                                                                   
    PAYDAY 2 is an action-packed, four-player co-op shooter that once again  
    lets gamers don the maska of the original PAYDAY crew - Dallas,          
    Hoxton, Wolf and Chains - as they descend on Washington DC for an epic   
    crime spree.                                                             
                                                                             
                                                                             
  
  RELEASE NOTES     

   FEATURES

    Includes All Updates up to v1.24.1 (Update #52.1) (Jan 23 2015)

    No Steam required

    All DLC and Pre-Order content included

    Online Ready

    Works Online/LAN/Offline

    No Internet Connection required for LAN/Offline Play

    Community Content unlocked

    Language Selector

  
  OTHER 
                                             
    Launch the game from the shortcut to launch the Online Client.

    Online Client version: 3.14
                                                                             
 
   INSTRUCTIONS                                                  
                                                                            
    1. Install the setup.                                                  
    2. Start the game via Launcher.exe (as administrator).   
    3. When you're in-game, go to Crime.net:                              
    HOST: Choose a heist and Create a game.                          
    CLIENT: Host's game should be visible in Crime.net.              
    4. Play & Enjoy!
